articles.title: Missile fired by Yemen's Houthis lands near Israel's main airport
articles.description: A missile fired by Yemen's Houthi rebels toward Israel on Sunday landed near Ben Gurion Airport, the country's main international airport, sending a plume of smoke into the air and causing panic among passengers in the terminal building.

articles.title: Donald Trump Dismisses Price Increases—'That's Peanuts'
articles.description: "When you say strollers are going up, what kind of a thing?" the president said in a new interview.
articles.content:
President Donald Trump dismissed price increases on common items purchased by consumers in an interview with NBC News' Meet the Press, saying "that's peanuts compared to energy."
